Direct Known Subclasses:
DBUnitXMLLoader, SQLLoader
public abstract class AbstractLoader
extends Object
implements Loader

Abstract base class for loaders that implements the Loader.isSupported() method.

1.0.0

isSupported

public final boolean isSupported(File source)
Determine whether or not the data or script can be loaded or executed.

Specified by:
isSupported in interface Loader
Parameters:
source - The source file containing the data or script.
Returns:
  • true if the data or script can be loaded or executed.
  • falseif the data or script cannot be loaded or executed.
